Package aom.scripting.xs.tr

Class Player

Object
Player
public class Player
extends Object
This class provides a collection of Trigger commands concerning Players.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int trCurrentPlayer()
    Returns the current player
    bool trPlayerActive​(int playerID)
    Returns true if the player is active.
    bool trPlayerAtPopCap​(int playerID)
    Returns true if player is at pop cap.
    int trPlayerBuildingCount​(int playerID)
    Returns the number of buildings for the player.
    bool trPlayerCountBuildingInProgress​(int playerID, string protoName)
    Returns true if building is being built.
    bool trPlayerDefeated​(int playerID)
    Returns true if the player has been defeated.
    string trPlayerGetDiplomacy​(int playerID, int player2ID)
    Gets the diplomacy status between players.
    int trPlayerGetPopulation​(int playerID)
    Returns the player population.
    void trPlayerGrantResources​(int playerID, string resource, int amount)
    Grants the given amount a resource to the given player.
    void trPlayerKillAllBuildings​(int playerID)
    Kills all of the buildings of a given player.
    void trPlayerKillAllGodPowers​(int playerID)
    Kills all of the current God Powers of a player.
    void trPlayerKillAllUnits​(int playerID)
    Kills all of the units of a given player.
    void trPlayerModifyLOS​(int playerID, bool canSee, int player2ID)
    Adds/removes LOS between players.
    void trPlayerResetBlackMap​(int playerID)
    Resets the black map for a given human player.
    void trPlayerResetBlackMapForAllPlayers()
    Resets the black map for all human players
    int trPlayerResourceCount​(int playerID, string resource)
    Returns the number of resources for the player.
    void trPlayerSetActive​(int playerID)
    Sets the active player.
    void trPlayerSetDiplomacy​(int playerID, int player2ID, string status)
    Sets the diplomacy status between players
    void trPlayerTechTreeEnabledGodPowers​(int playerID, bool on)
    Enables/disables the technology tree from granting God Powers to a player.
    void trPlayerTribute​(int fromID, string resource, int amount, int toID)
    Tributes resources to a player.
    int trPlayerUnitAndBuildingCount​(int playerID)
    Returns the number of units and buildings for the player.
    int trPlayerUnitCount​(int playerID)
    Returns the number of units for the player.
    int trPlayerUnitCountSpecific​(int playerID, string protoName)
    Returns the number of proto units for the player.
    void trSetCurrentPlayerStatus​(bool active)
    Sets the current player as active or inactive
    void trSetPlayerDefeated​(int playerID)
    When called, the player is set to defeated on the local machine.
    void trSetPlayerWon​(int playerID)
    When called, the player is set to be victorious on the local machine.
    void trYouLose​(string text)
    Player loses, specifies message.
    void trYouWin​(string nextscenario, string text)
    Player wins, specifies next scenario to go to and message.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
